name: Rage Quitters
description:
Rage Quitters is a nostalgic 2D platformer Video-game, giving a massive throwback to early day gaming. Get ready around not just to have fun but to relive memories. 

Characters:
As a main, the Player controls a dog that fights through to the end. Other than that you can unlock and purchare various new animals to play with.

Action:
The Doggo knows how to handle a gun and shoot the monsters away. It can tackle the obstacles by hoping around to the end.

Abilities: 
The Doggo can not only sprint but also boost it's movement. And you get too tired jumping around, the amazing jetpack can be of help to fly away.

Soundtracks:
The Surreal acoustic soundtracks are no less a meditation. They'll keep your head calm and away from the massive incoming rage.

In-Game Purchases:
The Default skin isn't good enough for you? Well, you can purchase new skins right away through in-game purchases and continue your journey.
